title: Why don't iPhones have an extra SD card facility in every phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: With the rapid development of technology, the price of flash memory has become cheaper and cheaper. But Apple always regards the storage space of the device as a major criterion for users to choose. Secondly, Apple's strict requirements on industrial design have also played an important role. If it supports SD card external storage, it will undoubtedly cause irreparable damage to the simple and beautiful appearance of the iPhone. Therefore, Apple has continued this idea in the design of the body. In addition, the poor performance of the SD card itself is also a factor. Compared with the built-in flash memory, the reading speed of the SD card is often too slow, and it is prone to crash, often increasing unnecessary power consumption. So if you encounter an Apple mobile phone memory warning, your best way is to transfer some of the data on the mobile phone to the computer or back up some data on the computer. As far as i know， Syncios Data Transfer make up this disadvantage very well: Step 1： Run Syncios Data Transfer on your computer. If you are a Mac user, you can download the program for Mac version. After that, run the program to Backup module. This is a feature to back up the iPhone files and data to computer. You can one-click to back up contacts, messages, call logs, WhatsApp, music, photos, videos, apps, safari history, bookmark, notes, ebooks and more. Step 2: Then connect your iPhone to the program with USB cable. Beneath the phone icon, tap the 3 dots to create a computer local path which serves as the storage of your iPhone backup later.  Step 3: Tap Next button to select specific data you want to back up. You can back up part of the items that you matter. But to make a full backup, you can click on Select All button to select all the data. Step 4: Go following to tap Next button to load and transfer the data to computer as expect. If the data is in a large size, do keep patient with the process until it is completely done.
Not having a card slot gives them extra space inside the phone and also they’ve can have the phone better water and dust resistant.
